ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15.5 ounce) can cannellini beans, with liquid
1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with garlic and onion, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Add escarole near the end of cooking to preserve its texture and bright flavor
Use bean liquid to add body to the dish and prevent it from becoming dry
This is a one-pot meal; cook everything together for convenience
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I prepare escarole and prevent it from becoming bitter in this dish?
